original_title: 殺人動画サイト　デスチュブ2
overview: The sequel to the exciting terror film! 'Death Tube,' the website where murders are streamed live in real time, is back online with a new generation of challengers / victims! Who will escape and what will be left of them? The real killer is about to be revealed!  A new crop of contestants turn up to participate in a vicious game of life or death, broadcast live over the internet for all the world to see.
title: Death Tube 2
